com.here.mobility.sdk.demand

Class DemandDateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandDateTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public abstract class DemandDateTime
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    A helper class that helps you to describe a specific date and time.

      • create

        public static DemandDateTime create(int year,
                                    int monthOfYear,
                                    int dayOfMonth,
                                    int hourOfDay,
                                    int minuteOfHour)
        Create a new DemandDateTime We use GregorianCalendar conventions for the time parameters. So invalid parameters will be handled according to the calendar behavior.
        Parameters:
        year - the year
        monthOfYear - the month of the year, from 0 to 11
        dayOfMonth - the day of the month, from 1 to 31
        hourOfDay - the hour of the day, from 0 to 23
        minuteOfHour - the minute of the hour, from 0 to 59

      • getEpochTime

        public long getEpochTime(TimeZone timeZone)
        The epoch time with the given time zone.
        Parameters:
        timeZone - the time zone.
